channel.title: Jonin Help
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Jonin Help" - I really need help with this one. . .

item.title: Re: Jonin Help
item.content:encoded: Jonin Ascension is easy. Just use the 3 or 4 SE's then run missions with Annie 2 and Timmy 2 on your team. If you need, throw a party(only if you absolutely have to). It does not require too much preparation overall.

item.title: Re: Jonin Help
item.content:encoded: um I don't think you can do A-rank untill your Jonin so make that run B-ranks for the other 100,000 xp

item.title: Re: Jonin Help
item.content:encoded: Use 4 silver elixirs for 100,000 ranking XP each. Then just do some A-ranks to get the other 100,000. You need hollow leg and some ramen, or you can just use 3 and get the other 200k.

item.title: Jonin Help
item.content:encoded: Okay now, the Jonin Ascension for Season 2 and up players, is there any way around the 500,000 Ranking XP since it's so ridiculous besides avoiding the mission? Is there an easy way to get the ranking?
